Package org.apache.manifoldcf.core.lockmanager

Class LocalLock

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.manifoldcf.core.lockmanager.LocalLock
  • public class LocalLock
extends java.lang.Object
    This class describes a local lock, which can have various nested levels of depth.
